title: Beautiful Unoccupied Brand New House
details:
Real Solutions for your Real Estate Needs

බ්‍රෝකර්වරැ අනවයයි
ඔබ සැබැ නිර්ව්‍යාජ ගැණුම්කරැවෙක් නම්.......

මෙම දේපළට පැමිනිමට පළමුව කරුණාකර පැහැදිලිවම කලින් දින වේලාවක් වේන්කර ගෙන පැමිනෙන්න එසේ නොමැතිව අපහසු තාවයට පත් නොවන්න කරුණාකර දැන්විම සමිපුර්නයෙන් කියවීමෙන් පසුව අප අමතන්න.

CALLS MORN ING 7AM TO 1PM EVENING 4PM TO 8.30PM ONLY

SKYPE OPEN 24 HRS FOR OVERSEES CLIENT

MORE PROPERTIES FOR SALE PLEASE CLICK ON OUR COMPANY LOGO

SITE VISIT WITH EARLY CONFIRMATION ONLY

GENUINE BUYERS WELCOME






3 bedrooms, 2 attached bathrooms,

Fully porcelain tiles with Branded fittings
living, Dining, TV Lobby,

Modern pantry with special storage cupboards, kitchen,

main line water,
fully furnished house with modern amenities.

Landscaped garden s with 8ft wall around the house. Roller gate and small gate for
easy access.
Especially designed LED lighting to emphasis the concept Black & White also match with imported wallpapers

& Blinds, Full glass wall and 1 fully stone-embedded wall.
Designed by chartered architect and build under supervision of qualified engineers.

200m to the main road,Rathmal deniya road 2km to high level road (Darmpala Vidyalaya Pannipitiya

All leading Banks, Food outlets, cloth shops are very close by. 5 min drive to high way entrance.
please contact below named for more information or any clarification.
